# Packages and Data

First, load the packages we'll need.

```{r packages, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse) 
library(usethis)
```

Then, load the data from the `datasauRus` package. (Later we'll use functions like `read_csv` to read data from files, databases, websites, etc.)

```{r}
datasaurus_dozen <- datasauRus::datasaurus_dozen
```
